questions.question: This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
Set on an island dominated by a tyrannical Warlord, this arc introduces the character Law and features the Straw Hats battling against Caesar Clown. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate darkness. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, is known for his string-string fruit powers and role as a former Warlord of the Sea. Who is...?
